cast.original_title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part One
cast.overview: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team embark on their most dangerous mission yet: To track down a terrifying new weapon that threatens all of humanity before it falls into the wrong hands. With control of the future and the world's fate at stake and dark forces from Ethan's past closing in, a deadly race around the globe begins. Confronted by a mysterious, all-powerful enemy, Ethan must consider that nothing can matter more than his mission—not even the lives of those he cares about most.
cast.title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part One

cast.overview: Peter Parker and his friends go on a summer trip to Europe. However, they will hardly be able to rest - Peter will have to agree to help Nick Fury uncover the mystery of creatures that cause natural disasters and destruction throughout the continent.
cast.title: Spider-Man: Far From Home

details.biography: Brian Law was born and raised in Toronto, Canada and lived in Miami and Berlin before settling down in London, UK. He has appeared in major projects including 'Spider-man: Far From Home' (Marvel), 'Treason' (Netflix), 'White Dragon' (Amazon/ITV), 'Suspicion' (AppleTV+) and 'Doctor Who' (BBC). Prior to acting, he earned degrees in architecture and public policy.
details.name: Brian Law
